intro: Hieracium nigrolegionense, commonly known as the Black Legion Hawkweed, is a flowering plant native to parts of Europe and Asia. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in meadows and grasslands, preferring well-drained soils. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its flowers are yellow with a dark center. It is known for its aggressive growth and can sometimes become invasive in certain regions.
